attributes.action: Table a motion to parliament to stop members of The National Secular Society (NSS) being buried or having funerals in church's or on holy ground!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the NSS from having any contact with the church or any of it's charities due to the fundermental views it has.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for your local MP.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
